description: Ms. codex. Title from text 1. Origin: Text 2, Rajab 1231 H [June 1816] (leaf 235b). Remaining texts likely completed around the same time.
abstract: Collection consisting of a text on Shiʻite fiqh and two commentaries upon it.
contents: 1. leaves 1b-38a: [Kitāb Khalīfat al-Sulṭān] / Ḥusayn ibn Rafīʻ Sulṭān al-ʻUlamāʼ.
2. leaves 40b-135b: [Ḥāshiyah ʻalá Maʻālim al-dīn] / Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan al-Shīrwānī.
3. leaves 137b-235b: Maʻālim al-dīn wa-malādhdh al-mujtahidīn / Ibn al-Shahīd al-Thānī.
extent: 235 leaves : paper ; 207 x 152 (145-150 x 82-105) mm bound to 208 x 155 mm
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
binding_note: Full brown leather with blind-stamped central design and fillets.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
